hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Chest On Fire

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Morpha#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #3# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Forest Temple Compass#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Temple of Time#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest
